content: ch1 space per side 1 corner ch1 space omitting the last single_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet do not cut yarn 12 4dccl 12 single_crochet 24 ch3 space round 13 ch3 counts as your first double_crochet or with new color stand double_crochet in joining st *double_crochet in next 15 st/space 2 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet round 7 skip all cluster in corner chain space double_crochet in next 19 st/space* repeat from * to * ch4 counts as your first double_crochet and ch1 double_crochet in same st around omitting the last double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in top of first * ch1 single_crochet in next chain space twice ch1 v-st in next single_crochet double_crochet 38 double_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space enter between the 2 front post strands through to the back not as usual in the top loops * repeat from round 14 ch1 single_crochet in same st as join or with new color stand single_crochet * to * around omitting the last v-st close with a slip_stitch in joining st *single_crochet in each st across to next corner single_crochet ch2 in 3rd chain do not cut yarn 12 v-st 24 single_crochet 36 ch1 space single_crochet in corner ch2 space* repeat from * to * around and close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet cut yarn and weave in all ends round 8 skip all single_crochet and ch1 space work only in v-st chain space 40 single_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space slip_stitch in next chain space ch3 counts as your first double_crochet 5 double_crochet in ________________________________________________ same chain space fpdc in left double_crochet of the v you just worked in *ch1 fpdc in right double_crochet of next v 6 double_crochet in next v chain space fpdc around left double_crochet of the v you just worked in* repeat from * to * around ch1 fpdc around right double_crochet of first v close with a slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 and cut yarn 12 fan each with 2 fpdc and 6 double_crochet 12 ch1 space round 9 with new color stand bpsc around 4th double_crochet of any fan *loose ch2 skip next 3 st sppuff around ch1 space of round 7 and 8 loose ch2 skip 3 st bpsc around next 2 double_crochet* repeat from * to * around omitting the last bpsc close with a slip_stitch in first bpsc and do not cut yarn 12 puff 24 bpsc 24 ch2 space round 10 skip all sppuff and bpsc slip_stitch in next chain space beg2dccl ch2 2dccl in that chain space *ch1 2dccl ch2 2dccl in next chain space* repeat from * to * around ch1 slip_stitch in top of beg cluster to close 48 2dccl 24 ch2 space 24 ch1 space round 11 skip all cluster slip_stitch in next chain space ch1 2 single_crochet in that space or with new color stand single_crochet in chain space after last join single_crochet in same chain space design by © koernerklaus april 2019
